title.rendered: The Haunting of Sherlock Holmes and Other Stories

content.rendered:
This collection features 12 mysteries that will fascinate readers from all over the globe. The book sees Holmes track down documents stolen from the Vatican Secret Archives in The Kingdom of the Blind, trap elusive con artists in The Adventure of the Slipshod Charlady, expose a family’s darkest secrets in The Case of the Litchfield Murder, discover murder in the midst of The Travelling Orchestra and even save. The Defenestrated Princess from certain death.

There is never a dull moment when the Great Detective is on the chase!
